description: This meta shows you how to validate services like DSTV smartcard no, Meter number etc.

spec.item_code: This is the code for the product to be purchased. Can be gotten from the response payload of GET /v3/bill-categories
spec.code: This is the biller code for the service
spec.customer: This is the customer identifier For airtime, the value must be the customer's phone number. For DSTV, it must be the customer's smartcard number
